mapper.sql: id, resource_id, group_id, filter_difinition_id, op, filter_value
mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.resource_id,t1.group_id,t1.filter_difinition_id,t1.op,t1.filter_value,t2.name,t2.type,t2.value_type,t2.data_type,t2.table_name,t2.col_name,t2.key from filter t1 left join filter_difinition t2 on t1.filter_difinition_id=t2.id where t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t1.id,t1.resource_id,t1.group_id,t1.filter_difinition_id,t1.op,t1.filter_value,t2.name,t2.value_type,t2.data_type,t2.table_name,t2.col_name,t2.key from filter t1 left join filter_difinition t2 on t1.filter_difinition_id=t2.id where t1.group_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
